sentences.sContent: This idyllic pastoral scene is only part of the picture.
sentences.sContent_eng: This idyllic pastoral scene is only part of the picture.
sentences.sCn: 但这种田园诗般的乡村风光仅仅是一个侧面。

sentences.sContent: Some believe that lemurians were much more like early humans living in a sort of idyllic paradise largely agrarian with lush forests and an abundance of flowers and fruit trees.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some believe that lemurians were much more like early humans living in a sort of idyllic paradise largely agrarian with lush forests and an abundance of flowers and fruit trees.
sentences.sCn: 一些就相信利莫里亚更加像早期的人类，生活在一种田园诗般的天堂里，主要地与繁荣的森林，盛开的花朵和结果的树在一起。

sentences.sContent: I don't mind a bit of idiosyncrasy, but that strange ideology you believe in , coupled with your idyllic ideas on life, suggest to me that all you're doing is looking for some idol to follow.
sentences.sContent_eng: I don't mind a bit of idiosyncrasy, but that strange ideology you believe in , coupled with your idyllic ideas on life, suggest to me that all you're doing is looking for some idol to follow.
sentences.sCn: 你有一点特殊的癖性我不在乎，但你相信的那种奇怪的意识形态，加上你向往田园诗般生活的想法，给我的印象是你在做的就是要找到一个偶像来效仿。

trans.tranCn: 田园诗般的， 田园风光的， 牧歌的
